actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Assistance and Unemployment Compensation

official_title: A bill to increase the number of weeks for which Federal supplemental unemployment compensation is payable.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Supplemental Compensation Act of 1982 to increase the number of weeks for which Federal supplemental unemployment compensation is payable. Directs the Secretary of Labor to make appropriate modifications of agreements with States under such Act.

titles.title: A bill to increase the number of weeks for which Federal supplemental unemployment compensation is payable.
